---
id: list-pix-infraction-report-v-2
title: "List Infraction Reports"
description: "Gets list of infractions reports to which the participant is a party."
sidebar_label: "List Infraction Reports"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Infraction Reports"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/pix/infraction-report/search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets list of infractions reports to which the participant is a party.

Notification list is sorted in ascending order by the `LastModified` field.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"isReporter","description":"Restricts to reports in which the participant is the debtor","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"in":"query"},{"name":"isCounterparty","description":"Restricts to reports in which the participant is credited.","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"StatusOpen":{"value":"OPEN"},"StatusAcnowledged":{"value":"ACKNOWLEDGED"},"StatusCancelled":{"value":"CANCELLED"},"StatusClosed":{"value":"CLOSED"}},"name":"status","description":"Status List to be searched","schema":{"enum":["OPEN","ACKNOWLEDGED","CLOSED","CANCELLED"],"type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"name":"includeDetails","description":"Includes the details of the report (Details fields). Default: False.","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ModifiedAfterDate":{"value":"2020-02-01T10:00:00Z"}},"name":"modifiedAfter","description":"Filters reports with modification time greater than or equal to modifiedAfter.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ModifiedBeforeDate":{"value":"2020-02-28T10:00:00Z"}},"name":"modifiedBefore","description":"Filters reports with modification date time less than or equal to modifiedBefore.","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"name":"limit","description":"Limit number of reports to return.","schema":{"default":20,"maximum":200,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
